Place your movie file(s) for "My Hero Academia Two Heros" in this folder.
Recommended format: MP4 (H.264/AAC) for broad browser compatibility.
Example filename: My.Hero.Academia.Two.Heros.Tamil.mp4
These files will be listed by /api/episodes?anime=My%20Hero%20Academia%20Two%20Heros and played via /play/<anime>/<filename>.
